caption.p: The dependence of the change in tree fractional coverage (Δ F tree; %) on the mean annual precipitation (MAP; mm/year) and tree fractional coverage in the control simulation ( F tree,ctrl; %) in the cases of MAP increasing and decreasing by 15% for (a, b) IAP‐DGVM and (c, d) CLM4‐CNDV. The blue line indicates the area‐averaged Δ F tree. The black solid line and dashed line denote the 10th and 90th percentiles, respectively
